slides.description: The client list view will show the client name, contact name, contact email, and merchant account status
If a client has setup and connected their Stripe account, their "Merchant" tab in the admin will indicate as much, and display their Stripe account ID for reference.
If a client has not yet setup and connected a Stripe account, their "Merchant" tab will indicate that, and provide a link that can be used to setup their account.
The account setup process is extremely simple. They provide a mobile phone and email address.

Provide basic info (name, business name). 
 Provide Bank or Debit Card info (so they can get paid)
Once they complete that workflow, they will notified of a successful integration. At this point the clients account is setup and connected to V3Plus.
